label: Main Quests
desc: Major storylines that drive Hornet’s journey across Pharloom.

items.label: Citadel Seeker
items.description: Begin your ascent through the Great Citadel.

items.label: The Threadspun Town
items.description: Break the silken curse ensnaring Bellhart.

items.label: Grand Gate Bellshrines
items.description: Awaken the old bells throughout Pharloom.

items.label: Silent Halls
items.description: Venture inside the Citadel and confront the veiled bugs.

items.label: Pharloom’s Crown
items.description: Scale the Citadel and confront the one who haunts Pharloom.

items.label: Threefold Melody
items.description: Learn the melodies to reach the Citadel’s crest.

items.label: Soul Snare
items.description: Set a deadly trap for Pharloom’s monarch.

items.label: Black Thread Saga
items.description: Discover the fate of Pharloom and confront its dark heart.

label: Wayfarer Quests
desc: Help travelers and wanderers you meet along the way.

items.label: Save the Fleas
items.description: Find and rescue the lost fleas.

items.label: My Missing Courier
items.description: Search for Tipp, the lost courier.

items.label: The Wandering Merchant
items.description: Track the merchant Jubilana across Pharloom.

items.label: Balm for the Wounded
items.description: Aid the pilgrim Sherma on his journey.

items.label: Trail’s End
items.description: Search for Shakra and her master in Bilewater.

items.label: Fatal Resolve
items.description: Confront the Pinstress atop Mount Fay.

items.label: Hero’s Call
items.description: Answer the distress call near the Blasted Steps.

label: Hunt Quests
desc: Track and defeat dangerous beasts across Pharloom.

items.label: Pilgrim Rags
items.description: Hunt haunted pilgrims and collect their shawls.

items.label: Flexile Spines
items.description: Hunt hokers in the Far Fields and gather spines.

items.label: Roach Guts
items.description: Slay muckroaches and collect roach guts.

items.label: The Terrible Tyrant
items.description: Hunt a Skull Tyrant of the Marrow.

items.label: Savage Beastfly
items.description: Track and defeat the savage Beastfly.

items.label: The Wailing Mother
items.description: Hunt the wailing creature in the Slab.

items.label: Broodfeast
items.description: Collect organs to feed the Huntress’s brood.

label: Gather Quests
desc: Collect rare resources and ingredients found in the wild.

items.label: Berry Picking
items.description: Collect mossberries for the druid in Mosshome.

items.label: Rite of the Pollip
items.description: Gather Pollip Hearts from the flowers of Shellwood.

items.label: Silver Bells
items.description: Collect silver bells from the Bellvein tunnels.

items.label: Alchemist’s Assistant
items.description: Collect Plasmium Buds from the Lower Wormways.

items.label: Great Taste of Pharloom
items.description: Find rare delicacies from across Pharloom.

label: Donate Quests
desc: Contribute resources to aid Pharloom’s restoration.

items.label: Bonebottom Repairs
items.description: Donate Shell Shards to repair Bonebottom.

items.label: A Lifesaving Bridge
items.description: Donate Shell Shards to construct a bridge.

items.label: Restoration of Bellhart
items.description: Donate Rosaries to aid Bellhart’s rebuilding.

items.label: Building Songclave
items.description: Donate Rosaries to expand the Songclave.

items.label: Icon of Hope
items.description: Contribute to the construction of an icon in Bellhart.

label: Special / Misc Quests
desc: Unique or one-time encounters that don’t fit other categories.

items.label: Hunter’s Journal
items.description: Defeat creatures to fill the Hunter’s Journal.

items.label: Passing of the Age
items.description: Witness the cryptic journey of the wandering mushroom.

items.label: Fastest in Pharloom
items.description: Race Sprintmaster Swift and prove your speed.
